Subversion   

Instructions on accessing the source code using subversion repositories.

Subversion Services

    * svn.ezcommunity.net
    * svn.web.ezcommunity.net 

Repositories

    * http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity
    * http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity-contributions 

Checking out the source code

Here is an example command to checkout the source code

svn co http://svn.ezcommunity.net/src/ezcommunity/trunk /web/pro/ezpublish
